Text: Good to get the ebook before it is released. Wanted to read it today during my 8hr flight.

This torrent: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6191887

Is properly formatted for most eBooks, took me ages to find! Enjoy!

This is a really great book with some incredible information on hacking the human body. I have a copy on my nightstand. Please consider purchasing the book as well to support the author...he is truly an amazing individual.

You can dload a (free) PDF of the Slow-Carb Diet Cookbook at:

http://robbwolf.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/The-Slow-Carb-Cookbook.pdf

If ya'll are going to follow one tip in this book (he gives a few), make it the one called "15-minute orgasm."  
Just gave that to a girl from my school and she's been begging for more every night. 
Bros helping bros.

This book is really great, I downloaded it here, and liked it so much that I bought a copy! Check it out if you enjoy great amounts of information that can help you, and is backed by research and science!
I also bought a copy. Great stuff, "body hacking" at it's best.
